item.title: Faithlife-Theological-Favorites-Sankey
item.description: As we are stuck at home amid the current covid-19 crisis, I thought I’d take advantage of everyones increased engagement with Instagram on posts where follower vote-by-comment on their favorites. item.title: About
item.description: Websters dictionary defines “about” as: about, adverb: reasonably close to which honestly I thought would be more helpful1–but now I’m kind of flustered and want to bail on this whole idea to “do a blog” about “things” I am “interested” in2 and “try to impress” the unfortunate beings who happen to click on something that commands their computer to show screen pixels that reveal this sentence3. In conclusion, this is a place where patterns emerge on a server4 due to the vibrations of my brain5.

item.title: There may be a blog post here someday
item.description: But not today. seriously, its not. I’m just trying to plot something to see if it works. like this 1 Figure 1: hmmm.

item.title: Covid-19 in Skagit Valley, Wa
item.description: Total daily counts of covid-19 cases, hospitalizations and deaths reported by Skagit Public Health. Cases include total confirmed and presumptive positives, which means that a private lab reported a positive test. Hospitalized are people with positive tests who were hospitalized at any point during their illness. The first case in Skagit Valley was reported on March 10, 2020.
